metadata.name: New start
metadata.description:
Sometimes we have to accept the reality and admit that we have made some mistakes which have taken us away from light and lead into darkness.
Mistakes that, like a double-edged sword, discolor our souls and annoy us from within.
I used 13 swords in this work
Contrary to popular belief, the number thirteen is the symbol of the beginning of a new era. We can learn from our sins and build our new world.
It's not too late. With awareness, perseverance and courage, we can mark a new era in life.
--
Technique: A combination of photography, painting and digital techniques
--
